orig_cn: 耐心是人们遇见困难是等待的能力。
orig_en: I believe patience is a kind of ability to wait when faced with setbacks.
meaning: 遇见困难时，不焦虑。不退缩，不放弃的能力。
recommend: I believe patience is a kind of ability, which allows you to wait/stay calm when faced with setbacks/obstacles/hurdles
qtype: I：中文太过诗意，而说话人英文水平不支持他处理这种内涵丰富的语句。
